formattedAddress: 83 E 110th St, New York, NY 10029, USA
adrFormatAddress: 83 E 110th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: We have used their wash and fold service for the last 2 years and every time the service was so good! The husband-wife pair and their kids are amazing!! They are very social and excellent with their work. Laundry was something we never had to worry for the last 2 years because of S&J laundromat. I would highly recommend this to anyone in the neighborhood. They haven’t once misplaced our clothes. They have always been on time!!

originalText.text:
I used the wash and fold service here regularly for a few months while I lived in the neighborhood. I recently had to move, but they always treated my clothes with respect and did a better job than whenever I do my own laundry.

It was also pretty cheap, especially factoring in that my alternative is multiple loads of coin operated laundry in my apartment building which adds up fast (not actually cheaper than doing my own laundry, but actually really close in price).

The staff was very nice and the service always got done in a timely manner (sometimes on the same day I dropped them off if it wasn't too busy).

I would recommend this for anyone looking for a wash and fold service in the area.

originalText.text:
Good place to get your laundry done. Came here with 11 lbs of wash and press and was happy with the service. Shocked it was not more crowded on the weekend.  Lots of machines and dryers available - I think the washing machines are $2/wash. They will break your bills into quarters for you.

If I didn't have a laundry unit in my building basement I would come here to wash my clothes every week. Only downside is there's no place to sit down while waiting for clothes to wash and dry. They have a large folding table if you want to fold your laundry while there.

originalText.text: Will be back for them to wash the rest of my clothes. Thanks

originalText.text: The place has poor illumination and its an ugly area due construction but the dry cleaner service is amazing! 10+ items done perfectly in 3 days. Love it!
